name: Zen Relax Magical Puzzles & Classic Logic Games
name_original: Zen Relax Magical Puzzles & Classic Logic Games
description:
Zen Relax is a relaxing game of logic that is easy to play but hard to master. The objective is simple: Place bamboo stalks to guide the flowing sand into the vases.

- Objective: Place bamboo stalks strategically to guide the sand into the vases
- Relax with soothing sounds in a zen-like atmosphere
- Unlock ancient Chinese proverbs!
- Game Center leaderboard and achievements!

Challenge your brain with 64 mind bending levels!
